sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-sheet outlined color="secondary">
        <v-card
            :class="{'secondary lighten-5' : active}"
            @click="handleClick(plan.id)"
            outlined
            tile>
            <v-card-title class="justify-center text-md-h6">{{ plan.name }}</v-card-title>
            <v-card-text class="text-center">{{ plan.description }}</v-card-text>
        </v-card>
    </v-sheet>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'PlanCard',
    props: {
        plan: Object,
        active: Boolean,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            active: false,
        }
    },
    methods: {
        handleClick(value) {
            console.log('value: ', value)
            this.active = !this.active
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style lang="">
    
</style>
